name: What the bug! (Ehsan Mohammadi)
description:
Bugs are not always bad! Sometimes they can make a hard game, easier!
Help Jundo to finish the game by using bugs. Be aware of obstacles!

Controls:

Use Left/Right arrow keys to Walk

Hold Ctrl and Left/Right arrow keys to Run

Press Space to Jump

Gameplay video: https://youtu.be/IcV1G_eoCZ8

Backtrace project URL: https://poprockgames.sp.backtrace.io/p/what-the-bug/triage
